# cloudflare_token_validation_config (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_token_validation_config" "example_token_validation_config" {
  zone_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
  config_id = "4a7ee8d3-dd63-4ceb-9d5f-c27831854ce7"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `config_id` (String) UUID.
- `zone_id` (String) Identifier.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `credentials` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--credentials))
- `description` (String)
- `id` (String) UUID.
- `last_updated` (String)
- `title` (String)
- `token_sources` (List of String)
- `token_type` (String) Available values: "JWT".

<a id="nestedatt--credentials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `credentials`

Read-Only:

- `keys` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--credentials--keys))

<a id="nestedatt--credentials--keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `credentials.keys`

Read-Only:

- `alg` (String) Algorithm
Available values: "RS256", "RS384", "RS512", "PS256", "PS384", "PS512", "ES256", "ES384".
- `crv` (String) Curve
Available values: "P-256", "P-384".
- `e` (String) RSA exponent
- `kid` (String) Key ID
- `kty` (String) Key Type
Available values: "RSA", "EC".
- `n` (String) RSA modulus
- `x` (String) X EC coordinate
- `y` (String) Y EC coordinate
